page.title: 15EVENTS
page.content: During the summer term we held a Sponsored Silence for 30 minutes & a Bring & Buy Sale to raise money for the Bradford Fire Fund. In our Dinner hour we sat in silence thinking about how the fire, started by a cigarette, swept through the football stand killing or injuring many people. We all did the silence! The next day we had the sale. We raised {Â£380. } Our drama group entered the Redditch One Act Play Festival.Our play was called,"The Most Unsuccessful Bank Robbery."One of our girls, Daniella Hunt,wrote and produced the play.We did the lighting and the scenery ourselves with the help of the Palace Theatre staff.We won the Radio Wyvern Drama Cup for the Best Younger Competitors. {M Green }
